definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: We shall have more rigs in a year.
sentences.chinese: 一年後咱們將有更多的鑽探機。

sentences.english: As the diamond tip of the drill revolves, it is lubricated by mud.
sentences.chinese: 鑽探機的金鋼石鑽頭轉動時，由泥漿起潤滑作用。
